pr_title: Made JarResult.originalArtifact point to the actual original jar instead of where it should end up after renaming

timeline.message: Made JarResult.originalArtifact point to the actual original jar instead of where it should end up after renaming

timeline.bodyText: @mariofusco @evacchi i am not sure it is relevant for you but given that @mariofusco introduced this constant i wanted to check whether removing it is ok.
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: I only found this reference in a comment but I honestly don't even know if it's still relevant https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-runtimes/blob/bece507d15db8b3270d4d35408b29ec34dffc1de/kogito-quarkus-extension/deployment/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/quarkus/deployment/AppPaths.java#L132 @mariofusco
replies.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: So it looks like it's even better. With this change it will always be jar.
replies.author: aloubyansky

timeline.message: Mojo parameter to skip the original jar renaming to xxx.original
Skip original jar renaming for quarkus-cli
